title: Vanguard FTSE All-World ex-US Small-Cap Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for VSS - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the Vanguard FTSE All-World ex-US Small-Cap ETF (Symbol: VSS) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $102.19, changing hands as high as $102.43 per share. Vanguard FTSE All-World ex-US Small-Cap shares are currently trading up about 0.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of VSS shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
